survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the satisfaction levels of commuters using electric bicycles, focusing on aspects such as ease of use, reliability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for using an electric bicycle for commuting?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio button) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.
